mapper.insert: insert into cbc_ab_request ( ab_transaction_id, node_uuid, version_label, name, group_uuid, request_date) values ( #{transactionId}, #{nodeId}, #{versionLabel}, #{name}, #{groupId}, sysdate())

insert into cbc_ab_response ( ab_transaction_id, request_type, document_id, save_number, registration_number, response_date) values ( #{transactionId}, #{requestType}, #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saveNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: SELECT cbc_ab_request.node_uuid nodeId, cbc_ab_request.version_label versionLabel, cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id transactionId, cbc_ab_response.request_type requestType, cbc_ab_response.document_id documentId, cbc_ab_response.save_number saveNumber, cbc_ab_response.registration_number registrationNumber FROM cbc_ab_response, cbc_ab_request WHERE cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id= cbc_ab_response.ab_transaction_id AND cbc_ab_response.processed_date is null ORDER BY response_date

SELECT cbc_ab_request.node_uuid nodeId, cbc_ab_request.name nodeName, cbc_ab_request.version_label versionLabel, cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id transactionId, cbc_ab_response.request_type requestType, cbc_ab_response.document_id documentId, cbc_ab_response.save_number saveNumber, cbc_ab_response.registration_number registrationNumber FROM cbc_ab_response, cbc_ab_request WHERE cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id= cbc_ab_response.ab_transaction_id AND cbc_ab_request.node_uuid = #{nodeId} ORDER BY response_date desc

SELECT cbc_ab_request.node_uuid nodeId, cbc_ab_request.name nodeName, cbc_ab_request.version_label versionLabel, cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id transactionId, cbc_ab_response.request_type requestType, cbc_ab_response.document_id documentId, cbc_ab_response.save_number saveNumber, cbc_ab_response.registration_number registrationNumber FROM cbc_ab_response, cbc_ab_request WHERE cbc_ab_request.ab_transaction_id= cbc_ab_response.ab_transaction_id AND cbc_ab_request.group_uuid = #{groupId} ORDER BY response_date desc
